description:
Use my code MIKEC3 for $3 off your first eSIM and download Airalo today: https://try.airalo.com/fearlessandfar

Chewing gum is immensely popular, but where does it come from? When asked the question, I assumed it came from a tree. Well, it used to, but not anymore. The truth will scare you.
In this video, we adventure deep in the Yucatan Peninsula of Mexico, to learn the truth, and see first hand a dying tradition. 

@GarethLeonard Video about Leishmaniasis https://youtu.be/gYpw_KoFAvw?si=FFir9S6ptOj8a6TL

Big thanks to Arturo for helping me put this together, contact him for adventures in the Yucatan! https://www.instagram.com/tours_sukun/

Join me on my Adventures: https://www.fearlessandfar.com/trips

Secret Merch Project: https://www.fearlessandfar.com/lostartifacts

Watch my TOP ADVENTURE VIDEOS
✦ RAIDING a BABOON CAMP With HUNTER GATHERERS - https://youtu.be/Ny4bHOnSg0o
✦ A WEEK with the DEATH TRIBE of INDONESIA: https://youtu.be/Oc-wS-qG0_A
✦ Painful RITES of PASSAGE with the M
title: The Chewing Gum LIE (What's really in it?)
